Package com.intellij.xdebugger.breakpoints

Interface XBreakpointManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XBreakpointManagerImpl

    public interface XBreakpointManager
    Use XDebuggerManager.getBreakpointManager() to obtain instance of this service
